articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 and S7+ get One UI 4 stable update in Europe - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Samsung started to roll out Android 12-based One UI 4 stable updates for the Galaxy Tab S7 and Galaxy Tab S7+ in Europe.
articles.content: We can pretty much affirm that Samsung is now among the fastest brands rolling Android 12 for its smartphones. The company started its beta program shortly after the Android 12 announcement and is al… [+2408 chars]

articles.author: https://www.engadget.com/about/editors/bryan-menegus
articles.title: Sega left one of its European servers wide open - Engadget
articles.description: A misconfigured Amazon Web Services S3 bucket contained sensitive information which allowed researchers to arbitrarily upload files to Sega-owned domains and abuse a 250,000-user email list..
articles.content: What could have been a damaging breach in one of Sega's servers appears to have been closed, according to a report by security firm VPN Overview. The misconfigured Amazon Web Services S3 bucket conta… [+1534 chars]
